value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using scalable and cost-effective Durable Functions.

value.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

value.title: Connect to virtual machines through the Azure portal by using Azure Bastion
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Azure Bastion to securely connect to Azure Virtual Machines directly within the Azure portal.

value.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.

value.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Introduction to Linux on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the unique benefits of running Linux on Azure, and how to run Linux-based applications and workloads in the cloud with Azure.

value.title: Load balance your web service traffic with Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Improve application resilience by distributing load across multiple servers and use path-based routing to direct web traffic.

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: Move Azure resources to another resource group
value.excerpt: Learn how to identify Azure resources you can move, and how to move them to a new resource group.

value.title: Transcribe speech input to text
value.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

value.title: How to create a virtual machine in Azure | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: Azure provides multiple virtual machine configuration options for you to set up your virtual machine exactly how you want for whatever you're trying to do. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to configure a basic virtual machine and connect to it in minutes in the Azure portal.

value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Artifacts, an Azure DevOps service, to set up a feed for sharing packages with your team. value.title: What types of managed identities exist? | One Dev Question: Arturo Lucatero
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Arturo Lucatero, a Senior Program Manager working on managed identities for Azure resources, explains the different types of managed identities in the Microsoft identity platform.   For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/role-based-access-control/rbac-and-directory-admin-roles

value.title: Introduction to version control with Git
value.excerpt: Git is the leading version control tool and essential for developers. Learn how to leverage Git to track your own changes and collaborate with others.

topItems.title: Introduction to Git
topItems.excerpt: Use Git to track changes and collaborate with other developers

topItems.title: Collaborate with Git
topItems.excerpt: Use Git to track changes to source code and collaborate with other developers

topItems.title: Edit code through branching and merging in Git
topItems.excerpt: Level up your Git knowledge by learning about how to keep code separate using branches and how to merge them later

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Automate GitHub by using GitHub Script
value.excerpt: Learn to interact with the GitHub API from GitHub Actions by using GitHub Script.

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions. Use Vue.js and JavaScript to use SignalR using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Monitor cloud resources
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Monitoring how your cloud resources are performing is crucial to building reliable cloud applications. This module covers what monitoring is, why you need to do it, and how you can about monitoring your resources.

value.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.
